DFFlagPublicExecute.desc: Allows everyone to use the execute command

DFFlag1941.desc: Disables forwarding chat messages to Roblox

DFFlagPlaySoundOnNewSession.desc: Plays a beep sound on the current device running REM when a new session is created. (Does not work)

DFFlagChatMessageHandles.desc: Overrides chat DisplayNames with the user's handle
